headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Media Statement on Secretary Hegseth’s Drone Dominance Directive
summary: WASHINGTON, July 11, 2025--Teledyne FLIR Defense, part of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), has made the following statement in regard to U.S. Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth’s ‘Unleashing U.S. Military Drone Dominance’ memo of July 10.

headline: Teledyne Raymarine Acquires Maretron Assets to Boost Marine Automation
summary: Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) is one of the best manufacturing stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On July 1, Teledyne Technologies announced its acquisition of assets from Maretron, which included its Octoplex, MPower, and MConnect product lines, from Littelfuse Inc. (NASDAQ:LFUS). The acquisition enhances Teledyne’s Raymarine business by offering deeper integration and automation for […]
